trans-unit.source: Build Realtime Apps with Pusher (iOS) - Mobile Services
trans-unit.target: Build Realtime Apps with Pusher (iOS) - Mobile Services

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Pusher to send notifications to your Azure Media Services app on iOS.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Pusher to send notifications to your Azure Media Services app on iOS.

trans-unit.source: Build Real-time Apps with Mobile Services and Pusher
trans-unit.target: Build Real-time Apps with Mobile Services and Pusher

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how can add real-time functionality to your Azure Mobile Services-based app.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how can add real-time functionality to your Azure Mobile Services-based app.

trans-unit.source: When completed, your TodoList data is synchronized, in real-time, across all running instances of your app.
trans-unit.target: When completed, your TodoList data is synchronized, in real-time, across all running instances of your app.

trans-unit.source: The [Push Notifications to Users][] tutorial shows you how to use push notifications to inform users of new items in the Todo list.
trans-unit.target: The [Push Notifications to Users][] tutorial shows you how to use push notifications to inform users of new items in the Todo list.

trans-unit.source: Push notifications are a great way to show occasional changes.
trans-unit.target: Push notifications are a great way to show occasional changes.

trans-unit.source: However, sometimes an app needs frequent real-time notifications.
trans-unit.target: However, sometimes an app needs frequent real-time notifications.

trans-unit.source: Real-time notifications can be added to your mobile service using the Pusher API.
trans-unit.target: Real-time notifications can be added to your mobile service using the Pusher API.

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial, we use Pusher with Mobile Services to keep a Todo list synchronized when changes are made in any running instance of the app.
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial, we use Pusher with Mobile Services to keep a Todo list synchronized when changes are made in any running instance of the app.

trans-unit.source: Pusher is a cloud-based service that, like Mobile Services, makes building real-time apps incredibly easy.
trans-unit.target: Pusher is a cloud-based service that, like Mobile Services, makes building real-time apps incredibly easy.

trans-unit.source: You can use Pusher to quickly build live polls, chat rooms, multi-player games, collaborative apps, to broadcast live data and content, and that's just the start!
trans-unit.target: You can use Pusher to quickly build live polls, chat rooms, multi-player games, collaborative apps, to broadcast live data and content, and that's just the start!

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [http://pusher.com](http://pusher.com).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [http://pusher.com](http://pusher.com).

trans-unit.source: This tutorial walks you through these basic steps to add realtime collaboration to the Todo list application:
trans-unit.target: This tutorial walks you through these basic steps to add realtime collaboration to the Todo list application:

trans-unit.source: [Create a Pusher account][]
trans-unit.target: [Create a Pusher account][]

trans-unit.source: [Update your app][]
trans-unit.target: [Update your app][]

trans-unit.source: [Install server scripts][]
trans-unit.target: [Install server scripts][]

trans-unit.source: [Test your app][]
trans-unit.target: [Test your app][]

trans-unit.source: This tutorial is based on the Mobile Services quickstart.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial is based on the Mobile Services quickstart.

trans-unit.source: Before you start this tutorial, you must first complete [Get started with Mobile Services][].
trans-unit.target: Before you start this tutorial, you must first complete [Get started with Mobile Services][].

trans-unit.source: Create a new Pusher account
trans-unit.target: Create a new Pusher account

trans-unit.source: Update your app
trans-unit.target: Update your app

trans-unit.source: Now that you have your Pusher account set up, the next step is to modify the iOS app code for the new functionality.
trans-unit.target: Now that you have your Pusher account set up, the next step is to modify the iOS app code for the new functionality.

trans-unit.source: Install the libPusher library
trans-unit.target: Install the libPusher library

trans-unit.source: The [libPusher][] library lets you access Pusher from iOS.
trans-unit.target: The [libPusher][] library lets you access Pusher from iOS.

trans-unit.source: Download the libPusher library [from here][libPusherDownload].
trans-unit.target: Download the libPusher library [from here][libPusherDownload].

trans-unit.source: Create a group called _libPusher_ in your project.
trans-unit.target: Create a group called _libPusher_ in your project.

trans-unit.source: In Finder, unzip the downloaded zip file, select the **libPusher-combined.a** and **/headers** folders, and drag these items into the **libPusher** group in your project.
trans-unit.target: In Finder, unzip the downloaded zip file, select the **libPusher-combined.a** and **/headers** folders, and drag these items into the **libPusher** group in your project.

trans-unit.source: Check **Copy items into destination group's folder**, then click **Finish**
trans-unit.target: Check **Copy items into destination group's folder**, then click **Finish**

trans-unit.source: This copies the libPusher files into your project.
trans-unit.target: This copies the libPusher files into your project.

trans-unit.source: On the project root in the project explorer, click **Build Phases**, then click **Add Build Phase** and **Add Copy Files**.
trans-unit.target: On the project root in the project explorer, click **Build Phases**, then click **Add Build Phase** and **Add Copy Files**.

trans-unit.source: Drag the **libPusher-combined.a** file from the project explorer into the new build phase.
trans-unit.target: Drag the **libPusher-combined.a** file from the project explorer into the new build phase.

trans-unit.source: Change the **Destination** to **Frameworks** and click **Copy only when installing**.
trans-unit.target: Change the **Destination** to **Frameworks** and click **Copy only when installing**.

trans-unit.source: Within the **Link Binary With Libraries** area, add the following libraries:
trans-unit.target: Within the **Link Binary With Libraries** area, add the following libraries:

trans-unit.source: libicucore.dylib
trans-unit.target: libicucore.dylib

trans-unit.source: CFNetwork.framework
trans-unit.target: CFNetwork.framework

trans-unit.source: Security.framework
trans-unit.target: Security.framework

trans-unit.source: SystemConfiguration.framework
trans-unit.target: SystemConfiguration.framework

trans-unit.source: Finally within **Build Settings**, locate the target build setting **Other Linker Flags** and add the **-all_load** flag.
trans-unit.target: Finally within **Build Settings**, locate the target build setting **Other Linker Flags** and add the **-all_load** flag.

trans-unit.source: This shows the **-all_load** flag set for the Debug build target.
trans-unit.target: This shows the **-all_load** flag set for the Debug build target.

trans-unit.source: The library is now installed ready for use.
trans-unit.target: The library is now installed ready for use.

trans-unit.source: Add code to the application
trans-unit.target: Add code to the application

trans-unit.source: The QSTodoService now allows you to find items by **id** and add and complete items locally without sending explicit requests to the remote service.
trans-unit.target: The QSTodoService now allows you to find items by **id** and add and complete items locally without sending explicit requests to the remote service.

trans-unit.source: Replace the existing **addItem** and **completeItem** methods with the following code:
trans-unit.target: Replace the existing **addItem** and **completeItem** methods with the following code:

trans-unit.target: Note that items are now added and completed, along with updates to the UI, when events are received from Pusher instead of when the data table is updated.

trans-unit.target: At the end of the **tableView:commitEditingStyle:forRowAtIndexPath** method, replace the call to **completeItem** with the following code:

trans-unit.source: The app is now able to receive events from Pusher, and to update the local Todo list accordingly.
trans-unit.target: The app is now able to receive events from Pusher, and to update the local Todo list accordingly.

trans-unit.source: Install server scripts
trans-unit.target: Install server scripts

trans-unit.source: All that remains is setting up your server scripts.
trans-unit.target: All that remains is setting up your server scripts.

trans-unit.source: We'll insert a script for when an item is inserted or updated into the TodoList table.
trans-unit.target: We'll insert a script for when an item is inserted or updated into the TodoList table.

trans-unit.source: Log on to the [Azure Management Portal], click **Mobile Services**, and then click your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: Log on to the [Azure Management Portal], click **Mobile Services**, and then click your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: In the Management Portal, click the **Data** tab and then click the **TodoItem** table.
trans-unit.target: In the Management Portal, click the **Data** tab and then click the **TodoItem** table.

trans-unit.source: In **TodoItem**, click the **Script** tab and select **Insert**.
trans-unit.target: In **TodoItem**, click the **Script** tab and select **Insert**.

trans-unit.source: Replace the insert function with the following code:
trans-unit.target: Replace the insert function with the following code:

trans-unit.source: Replace the placeholders in the above script with the values you copied from the Connection Info dialog earlier:
trans-unit.target: Replace the placeholders in the above script with the values you copied from the Connection Info dialog earlier:

trans-unit.source: **`**your_app_id**`**: the app_id value
trans-unit.target: **`**your_app_id**`**: the app_id value

trans-unit.source: **`**your_app_key**`**: the app_key value
trans-unit.target: **`**your_app_key**`**: the app_key value

trans-unit.source: **`**your_app_key_secret**`**: the app_key_secret
trans-unit.target: **`**your_app_key_secret**`**: the app_key_secret

trans-unit.source: Click the **Save** button.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Save** button.

trans-unit.source: You have now configured a script to publish an event to Pusher every time a new item is inserted into the **TodoItem** table.
trans-unit.target: You have now configured a script to publish an event to Pusher every time a new item is inserted into the **TodoItem** table.

trans-unit.source: Select **Update** from the **Operation** dropdown.
trans-unit.target: Select **Update** from the **Operation** dropdown.

trans-unit.source: Replace the update function with the following code:
trans-unit.target: Replace the update function with the following code:

trans-unit.source: Repeat step 5 for this script to replace the placeholders.
trans-unit.target: Repeat step 5 for this script to replace the placeholders.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Save** button.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Save** button.

trans-unit.source: You have now configured a script to publish an event to Pusher every time a new item is updated.
trans-unit.target: You have now configured a script to publish an event to Pusher every time a new item is updated.

trans-unit.source: Test your app
trans-unit.target: Test your app

trans-unit.source: To test the app you'll need to run two instances.
trans-unit.target: To test the app you'll need to run two instances.

trans-unit.source: You can run one instance on an iOS device and another in the iOS simulator.
trans-unit.target: You can run one instance on an iOS device and another in the iOS simulator.

trans-unit.source: Connect your iOS device, press the **Run** button (or the Command+R key) to start the app on the device, then stop debugging.
trans-unit.target: Connect your iOS device, press the **Run** button (or the Command+R key) to start the app on the device, then stop debugging.

trans-unit.source: You now have your app installed on your device.
trans-unit.target: You now have your app installed on your device.

trans-unit.source: Run the app on the iOS simulator, and at the same time start the app on your iOS device.
trans-unit.target: Run the app on the iOS simulator, and at the same time start the app on your iOS device.

trans-unit.source: Now you have two instances of the app running.
trans-unit.target: Now you have two instances of the app running.

trans-unit.source: Add a new Todo item in one of the app instances.
trans-unit.target: Add a new Todo item in one of the app instances.

trans-unit.source: Verify that the added item appears in the other instance.
trans-unit.target: Verify that the added item appears in the other instance.

trans-unit.source: Check a Todo item to mark it complete in one app instance.
trans-unit.target: Check a Todo item to mark it complete in one app instance.

trans-unit.source: Verify that the item disappears from the other instance.
trans-unit.target: Verify that the item disappears from the other instance.

trans-unit.source: Congratulations, you have successfully configured your mobile service app to synchronise across all clients in realtime.
trans-unit.target: Congratulations, you have successfully configured your mobile service app to synchronise across all clients in realtime.

trans-unit.source: Next Steps
trans-unit.target: Next Steps

trans-unit.source: Now that you've seen how easy it is to use the Pusher service with Mobile Services, follow these links to learn more about Pusher.
trans-unit.target: Now that you've seen how easy it is to use the Pusher service with Mobile Services, follow these links to learn more about Pusher.

trans-unit.source: Pusher API documentation: <http://pusher.com/docs>
trans-unit.target: Pusher API documentation: <http://pusher.com/docs>

trans-unit.source: Pusher tutorials: <http://pusher.com/tutorials>
trans-unit.target: Pusher tutorials: <http://pusher.com/tutorials>

trans-unit.source: To learn more about registering and using server scripts, see [Mobile Services server script reference].
trans-unit.target: To learn more about registering and using server scripts, see [Mobile Services server script reference].

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
